goal.en: "The purpose of this course is simply to equip/enhance students with the capability of conducting academic research, as well as paper publication capability if possible. We will first of all learn through reading research methodology textbooks. It will be then followed by reading academic papers, sections by sections to see the layout a good papers should be. The sections include introductions, hypothesis development. In particular, the way to compose mediations and moderating relationships."
